channel.title: Hi is there anyother clients other than moparscape?
channel.description: are there any other clients other then moparscape that can rune moparscape servers??? if so please tell me where to download it and what its called becuz moparscape is always coming up with a red x in the upper left hand corner of the screen.... and i have no idea why......i mean it worked for me yesterday, but whatever. if u know of any other clients that can run moparscape servers tell me

item.title: Hi is there anyother clients other than moparscape?
item.dc:creator: @Owned_Irl1 Owned Irl
item.description:
@Owned_Irl1 wrote:

various server owners create there own clients… but you should continue to play with the offical client, as it is the easiest to work with…

The Moparscape client can acess any server you want, as long as you time in the correct information pertaining to the server, and if the server is online…

Read full topic
item.source: Hi is there anyother clients other than moparscape?
